name: Observe Technologies
description: The product uses M.L and C.V to give farmers a better understanding how to feed their fish: the largest cost of producing a fish and a large pollutant to the oceans if the feed is not eaten. The machine learning learning and the computer vision work in tandem to suggest the optimal amount to feed, health flagging and other alerts.

team.name: Pieter Fabry
team.bioHtml: Founder @Observe Technologies • MIT 35 Under 35 • Worked at @Zentrick, @National University of Singapore

team.name: Hemang Rishi
team.bioHtml: CEO at Observe Technologies, Electrical Engineer, Computer Vision, Robotics

team.name: Ivan Makeev
team.bioHtml: Applied research scientist (PhD), practical problem solver with strong math background. Broad expertise in computer vision, deep learning.

jobs.title: Full Stack Engineer
jobs.description:
We are looking for someone to join our software to help us revolutionise aquaculture: source of 1/3rd of the worlds protein source. We are building many outputs of our systems and we are looking for someone who thrives in high paced dynamic environments to join our team and will enjoy working with an ai company.

Work with our core development team to help us build out a RESTful cloud server. The server and infrastructures will be used to manage data streams coming from multiple locally deployed computer into our cloud databases. The data uploaded is from SQL tables and images.

Skills:
 - Node / Flask
 - AWS (S3, EC2)
 - MySQL
 - Docker


Responsibilities:
 - Work with the team to design the best architecture for the job
 - Come up with a scalable solution capable of relatively high traffic
 - Cloud Security in mind
 - Robust and tested final solution
